description: This file defines a set of functions and callbacks for constructing JSON structures within a CMake build process. It provides functions for beginning and ending JSON objects and arrays, handling key-value pairs, literals, and managing the construction context and callbacks.

methods.name: json
methods.description: Main function to construct JSON using callbacks, managing the context, and executing a user-provided argument list.

methods.name: json_obj_begin
methods.description: Callback to start a JSON object, appending '{' to the current context.

methods.name: json_obj_end
methods.description: Callback to end a JSON object, appending '}' to the current context.

methods.name: json_array_begin
methods.description: Callback to start a JSON array, appending '[' to the current context.

methods.name: json_array_end
methods.description: Callback to end a JSON array, appending ']' to the current context.

methods.name: json_obj_keyvalue_begin
methods.description: Callback to begin a key-value pair in a JSON object, converting key to JSON format and appending 'key:'.

methods.name: json_obj_keyvalue_end
methods.description: Callback to end a key-value pair, appending a comma if not the last element.

methods.name: json_array_element_end
methods.description: Callback to end an array element, appending a comma if not the last element.

methods.name: json_literal
methods.description: Handles JSON literals like null, true, false, or strings/numbers, converting content to JSON format.
